By pressing BUY you are committing (subject to contract) to buy this property. Once you have exchanged contracts or given a deposit to the seller this property will be taken off the market. Your request and contact details have been sent to the seller.

If you would like to view this item before you buy click this button, your details will be sent to the seller.

For our 1000s of M8s to market your property and finds a buyer for you, you need to give us the mandate to work on your behalf as referral agents, please read the text below then press next, you will be lead to the mandate page where you can sign it on your phone with your finger."

"As experienced real estate agents we understand that all deals are SUBJECT TO CONTRACT which is only calculable on completion of each sale."

To find a successful buyer for your property M8 charges the standard real estate agent commission of 3% once the purchase is completed."

This amount is shared amongst the successful M8s that helped sell your property and the M8 property administration that oversees the sale.

This amount is shared amongst the successful M8s that helped find your employee and the M8 sales administration that oversees the process.

Slow or no Internet Connection"\n"Please check your internet setting

"
" Title: Subject to contract"

"
Points to pay attention to when selling your own house."

"
Although the process of selling a property sounds daunting, it is actually relatively easy as long as you follow a few basic rules."

"
1. M8 strongly recommends that all clients that find their buyers through the M8 application hire the services of a legal representative (obligatory in most countries anyway) this can be:"

"
i) A Lawyer"

" ii) A solicitor"

" iii) A notary"

" iv) A real-estate professional"

"
A professional legal representative can guide you in your sale, making sure the documentation is complete."

"
2. Remember, no sale is ever complete until the contracts have been signed and the money received."

"
3. Make sure that when M8 sends people to view your property, that it is presentable, clean and tidy, get rid of clutter, when it comes to selling, less is more and if you are able to refresh the paintwork, do so. If you have a garden, keep it tidy. Some sellers have found that brewing coffee during the viewing gives a homely smell, likewise with baking bread!"

"
4. Make sure that there is no objection to the sale from all owners and interested parties."

"
5. Organise the handover conditions with the purchaser."

"
6. Selling privately is not difficult. Your legal representative can guide you if need be."

"
Disclaimer"

"
The information contained in this simple guide is for reference only it is not a contract of any type, you may choose to follow it or ignore it, it will not effect your sale and nothing mentioned in it will appear on your contract."

"
The information provided on this site relating to all properties has been furnished to us by the vendor/s. We have not verified whether or not that information is accurate and do not have any belief in one way or the other in its accuracy. We do not accept any responsibility to any person for its accuracy and do no more than pass it on. All interested parties should make and rely upon their own inquiries in order to determine whether or not this information is in fact accurate."

" Our company (including its owners, employees and agents) are not bound by any warranty, representation, collateral agreement or implied terms under the general law or imposed by legislation in relation to goods, services and other offers advertised on or purchased through our application."

" We accept no liability whatsoever in relation to the advertisement, sale or use of goods, services of other offers advertised on or purchased through our application ."

" Our company accepts advertisements for the sale of goods, services and is not involved with any transactions in relation to the advertised goods, services or other offers."

" If our company advertises your goods or services for sale, it does so only on the condition that you agree to indemnify from all liabilities or claims of liability that may arise from the sale of or subsequent use of those goods, services or other offers."

" If you purchase any item or service through our company you agree that you will not seek any remedy for any default in the item or for any damages that flow from the purchase of the item or service for any other reason."
